name: DORA Compliance Framework
description: Digital Operational Resilience Act framework for financial entities to manage ICT risks and ensure operational resilience.

framework.name: DORA Compliance Framework
framework.description: Framework for Digital Operational Resilience Act compliance

structure.title: ICT Risk Management
structure.description: Establish comprehensive ICT risk management framework

items.title: ICT Risk Management Framework
items.description: Implement a comprehensive ICT risk management framework
questions: Is there an ICT risk management policy?
Is ICT risk integrated into enterprise risk management?
Are ICT risks reported to the management body?

items.title: ICT Asset Management
items.description: Identify, classify, and document all ICT assets and their dependencies

items.title: ICT Business Continuity
items.description: Establish ICT business continuity policy and plans

structure.title: ICT Incident Management
structure.description: Establish processes for detecting, managing, and reporting ICT-related incidents

items.title: Incident Detection
items.description: Implement mechanisms to promptly detect anomalous activities
questions: Is 24/7 monitoring available for critical systems?

items.title: Incident Classification
items.description: Classify ICT-related incidents based on severity and impact
questions: Is there an incident classification scheme?
Is classification aligned with regulatory requirements?

items.title: Incident Reporting
items.description: Report major ICT-related incidents to competent authorities
questions: Is there a regulatory reporting process?

structure.title: Digital Operational Resilience Testing
structure.description: Conduct testing of ICT systems to assess resilience capabilities

items.title: Vulnerability Assessments
items.description: Conduct regular vulnerability assessments of ICT systems

items.title: Penetration Testing
items.description: Conduct penetration testing based on risk assessment

items.title: Threat-Led Penetration Testing
items.description: Conduct advanced threat-led penetration testing (TLPT) as required
questions: Is TLPT required for your entity?

structure.title: Third-Party ICT Risk
structure.description: Manage risks arising from ICT third-party service providers

items.title: Third-Party Strategy
items.description: Adopt a strategy on ICT third-party risk
questions: Is there a third-party ICT strategy?

items.title: Due Diligence
items.description: Conduct due diligence before engaging ICT third-party providers

items.title: Contractual Requirements
items.description: Include required contractual provisions in ICT third-party contracts

items.title: Ongoing Monitoring
items.description: Monitor ICT third-party providers on an ongoing basis

structure.title: Information Sharing
structure.description: Participate in information sharing arrangements on cyber threats

items.title: Threat Intelligence
items.description: Exchange cyber threat information with other financial entities
